mapper.select: select IFNULL(bpr.id,'') as id, IFNULL(rpr.type,'') as type , IFNULL(bpr.create_date,'') as createDate, IFNULL(CONCAT(IFNULL(dh.residential,'*'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.building,'栋'),'*栋'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.unit,'单元'),'*单元'),IFNULL(CONCAT(dh.number,'号'),'*号')) ,'') as address, IFNULL(bpr.content,'') as content, IFNULL(bpr.images,'') as images from dj_basics_patrol_record bpr inner join dj_house dh on bpr.house_id=dh.id inner join dj_worker_reward_punish_record rpr on bpr.id=rpr.reward_punish_correlation_id where bpr.id=#{rewordPunishCorrelationId}
